attributes.action: Investigate the security industry authoritys extortionate licence renewal fee.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A passport renewal fee is around the £70 mark and lasts for ten years. The renewal fee for a security industry authority close protection licence is now £245 for three years. Just what does this get you? A four to six month wait for your new licence and a piece of plastic. It is time to investigate this much critisised authority which no-one in the industry approves of.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Investigate the security industry authoritys extortionate licence renewal fee."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20232


Prime Minister's Office
